Genability Switch

IXD / WEB DESIGN / GREENSTART

About the project

Switch is a line of web and mobile applications that visualize a homeowner's potential savings by installing solar panels on their roof. Solar retailers make sales by giving homeowners an estimate of how much they are going to save by switching to solar. The goal of this project was to design products that would make Genability a trusted 3rd party to verify these estimates.

My role

I worked with a small team through all phases of the design process. Some of my responsibilities included research, wireframing, prototyping, and interface design.
